context: This is already being done.  Its called "Battle Bots."

So how does this work? Will it be like that Star Trek episode “A Taste of Armageddon” where the computers duke it out and then calculate how many people are sent to the evaporation chambers? Then people just peacefully march to their deaths?
Really didn't the guy who wrote this watch terminator as a kid.
Craziness.  Movies coming to life
Spaceballs:  The Radar Is Jammed
A scrap yard.
I did not read this but - !!! BANG !!! - we launched our nukes because our robots were loosing.
Watching "Eye in the Sky" is the perfect movie to explain why we haven't won wars since WW2.    China knows this and will have a huge leg up on America for unmanned weapon systems for years to come.
US robots , Chinese robots   All made in Taiwan.  I like my chances.
Nothing that a little EMP won't cure.

What would robot vs robot look like? Hmmm... I guess something like 

Pelosi vs Biden? 
AOC vs Sanders?
Obama vs Merkel?

It would be interesting to watch two robots go at each other. Will Dana White be putting this event together?
Since most of the the "integrated chips" are made in China and if the US has a skirmish with China, wouldn't the US be sending the parts back to the "maker" of the ASIC's in China?

replies.context: Don't know why my reply got deleted. But basically, we're in deep trouble. BOTH our political parties have sold us out to China, starting with Nixon. Almost every single electronic component is made in China, even the humble resistor is impossible to find manufactured anywhere else. Same with our tools, Fluke used to be 100% American made, but not anymore, most are built in China now.

context: A war might start out Robot on Robot, but as soon as one side ran low on machines or out it would move to human soldiers  and if close in Tech both sides would be back to human on human pretty quickly..
Kinda like the Republican vs. the Democrats - Pelosi vs. Trump -  Schumer vs Mitch -  etc. etc. etc.
It will start with high tech robots and end with sticks and stones.

China is also developing Self Improving Strong AI. They will eclipse our research within a decade. If they win this race, if they get it before we do, there will be no second chance for us. We will not be able to catch up.

I cannot stress enough how critical it is that they do not beat us at this. This has gone from scifi terminator realm to already having practical examples in narrow fields. You think Iran with nukes is bad? Wait till you see what a system with the intellectual capacity of a couple 100 Einstein's can do in the hands a country that wants to demolish you.
Time for Robocop.
Wait a minute... will any of the robots be black?
Which ever side that has faster and more intelligent AI algorithms will win!
The opening scene of Terminator flashes.
Stop sending China your money via Amazon people!

context: It’s racist to only send robots to war.
